thread.title: Drawing the Future of Masculinity With Esther Perel and Baratunde Thurston

title: Drawing the Future of Masculinity With Esther Perel and Baratunde Thurston
text: May 24, 2018 Drawing the Future of Masculinity With Esther Perel and Baratunde Thurston Comedian and activist Baratunde Thurston and psychotherapist Esther Perel sketch out where the believe gender equality and male vs. female relationships are heading By Wall Street Journal Staff May 24, 2018 11:00 am Is a 50/50 partnership fair? Psychotherapist Esther Perel joins comedian and activist Baratunde Thurston to discuss the future of male and female relationships and equality. Drawing the Future Visualizing the future is hard. So we've asked leading innovators and entrepreneurs to draw their vision of what's to come in business, technology and more. Up Next in Drawing the Future Ep.1 Drawing the Future of Work With Slackâ€™s CEO Ep.2 Drawing the Future of Health and Beauty With Bobbi Brown Ep.3 Drawing the Future of Transportation With Flying Cars Ep.4
